com.delphix.masking.api.plugin.referenceType

Class FileReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.delphix.masking.api.plugin.referenceType.GenericReference
      • com.delphix.masking.api.plugin.referenceType.FileReference

  • public final class FileReference
extends GenericReference
    This class wraps a file URL reference in order to make it discoverable by the MaskingAPI via reflection.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileReference.FileReferenceType
      Enumeration of file reference types based on the schema and authority in the URI

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileReference

        public FileReference()

      • FileReference

        public FileReference(@Nonnull
                     java.lang.String uri)
        Construct a reference to a file.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI of the file referenced. The valid URI formats are,
        URI Format Description
        http[s]://<host>[:<port>]/<path> To open files located on an web server.
        jar://file/<filepath> To open a file located in the algorithm jar
        delphix-file://upload/<file reference id> To open a file uploaded using masking engine's fileUpload endpoint
        delphix-file://mount/<mountType>/<mountId>/<file path> To open a file located on a NFS/CIFS mount server that has been mounted inside the masking engine using mountFilesystem endpoint.
        file://<filepath> To open a local file

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        @JsonPropertyDescription(value="The URI of the referenced file")
public java.lang.String getValue()
        Description copied from class: GenericReference
        Getter
        Overrides:
        getValue in class GenericReference
        Returns:
        The name of the algorithm associated with this reference.

      • checkValid

        public void checkValid()
                throws ComponentConfigurationException
        Test whether an algorithm reference is syntactically valid. This does not test whether the referenced object is currently available. This method throws the appropriate exception if the reference is invalid.
        Overrides:
        checkValid in class GenericReference
        Throws:
        ComponentConfigurationException - When the reference is invalid
